Our Class of 2024 students competing at the International Science Fair.

Template

Founded in 2007, the Rockdale Magnet Fund is the parent organization “booster club” established to support the students, faculty, staff, and parents of the Rockdale Magnet School for Science and Technology (RMSST) in Conyers, Georgia.


We believe parent involvement should be one of the foundations of the strength of our school.  We are a volunteer organization providing support to our school, which would not be possible without the generous support of our RMSST family.

Class of 2024 student, Jessica Rhee, competed at the International Science Fair in Dallas, Texas. This once-in-a-lifetime experience was greaty supported by the fund.

Template

  • - This for all students to allow students more freedoms to create meaningful research and not stress over financial restraints.
  • - That to all clubs, increasing not only academic, but exciting extracurricular opportunities for students.
  • - This for events such as the annual Monster Dash, Fall Ball, Magnet Movie Night, and many others which are adored by students and remembered forever.
  • - Much, Much More! Seriously, check out a snippet of the gallery below. Many of these opportunites are made possible by the fund. View our full gallery here.
